definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: The Douhe normal fault extends right over the epicentral region of Tangshan City.
sentences.chinese: 陡河正断层刚好插到唐山市震中区的正下方。

sentences.english: Its common structural forms are the shovel-like normal fault and spoon-like normal fault.
sentences.chinese: 常见的构造形态为铲式正断层和勺状正断层。

sentences.english: Its common structural forms are the shovel-like normal fault and spoon-like normal fault.
sentences.chinese: 常见的构造形态为铲式正断层和勺状正断层。

sentences.english: The normal faults converge toward great depths or terminate at the detachment fault surfaces within the mid-crust.
sentences.chinese: 正断层向深部收敛或终止于中地壳内的拆离断层面上。

sentences.english: A half-graben is a downdropped block bounded by a normal fault on only one side.
sentences.chinese: 半地堑是向下陷落的断块，只在一侧是以正断层为界。

definition: reverse fault (geology)/compression fault, where one block pushes over the other at dip of less than 45 degrees
strike-slip fault (geology)/fault line where the two sides slide horizontally past one another
pinyin: zou3 xiang4 hua2 dong4 duan4 ceng2
